spec_data.Name: txt2tags
spec_data.Description:
Txt2tags is a document generator. It reads a text file with minimal markup as
**bold** and //italic// and converts it to the following formats:

    * HTML
    * XHTML
    * SGML
    * LaTeX
    * Lout
    * Man page
    * Wikipedia (NEW)
    * Google Code Wiki (NEW)
    * DokuWiki (NEW)
    * MoinMoin
    * MagicPoint
    * PageMaker
    * Plain text
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:10:07 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Summary: Converts text files to HTML, XHTML, LaTeX, and other formats
